param.name: domainid
param.description: the ID of the domain associated with the service offering

param.name: issystem
param.description: is this a system vm offering

param.name: systemvmtype
param.description: the system VM type. Possible types are "consoleproxy", "secondarystoragevm" or "domainrouter".

param.name: virtualmachineid
param.description: the ID of the virtual machine. Pass this in if you want to see the available service offering that a virtual machine can be changed to.

response.name: id
response.description: the id of the service offering

response.name: cpuspeed
response.description: the clock rate CPU speed in Mhz

response.name: created
response.description: the date this service offering was created

response.name: defaultuse
response.description: is this a default system vm offering

response.name: displaytext
response.description: an alternate display text of the service offering.

response.name: domainid
response.description: the domain id of the service offering

response.name: hosttags
response.description: the host tag for the service offering

response.name: issystem
response.description: is this a system vm offering

response.name: limitcpuuse
response.description: restrict the CPU usage to committed service offering

response.name: name
response.description: the name of the service offering

response.name: networkrate
response.description: data transfer rate in megabits per second allowed.

response.name: offerha
response.description: the ha support in the service offering

response.name: storagetype
response.description: the storage type for this service offering

response.name: systemvmtype
response.description: is this a the systemvm type for system vm offering

response.name: tags
response.description: the tags for the service offering
